pr_title: Fix for login using PIN when no User exists for a UserKeyRecord

timeline.message: use password from UKR instead of entered pin for user sync

timeline.bodyText: This might be a silly question, but does this mean that in subsequent logins using pin, this password will be sent as null?  cuz here it's being set to null for pin login mode
timeline.author: ShivamPokhriyal

replies.bodyText: Password gets set from here in pin mode, so it should not be null.
replies.author: shubham1g5
